title: Designing Effective Language Teaching Methods Using e-Learning and Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Blended learning design competency development program for pre-service and in-service elementary teachers to enhance language education capabilities

learning_goals: Learners can design strategies for utilizing online communication tools to deliver information in blended learning environments
Learners can propose at least three effective face-to-face teaching strategies for collaborative language learning scenarios
Learners can develop blended learning lesson plans through project-based assessments and incorporate peer feedback

resources: Smartphone-Based Collaboration Tools (e.g., Google Classroom, KakaoTalk Open Chat)
Offline Group Activity Materials (Flashcards, Role-Play Scenarios)
Digital Language Learning Content (Podcasts, Video Clips)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
